attributes.action: Give all members of The Flaming Stars MBE's for their services to the music industry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its been a long time since The Beatles did anything good, and The Flaming Stars - namely:

Joe Whitney - drums
Huck Whitney - guitar
Max Décharné - vocals, keyboards
Mark Hosking - guitar
Paul Dempsey - bass;

are a critically underrated, unacknowledged popular combo and are horrifically and spitefully ignored by todays music industry. Maybe they like it that way, but I dont, and neither should you. For a band that consistently hit the heights with every release, that consistently are true to their beliefs, and hairstyles, and creaking keyboards, I think this country needs to get really and show their support for true genius. So please sign this petition to get them the honour they deserve.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
